patthana17.14:1.1_0: Akusalaṁ micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.14:2.1_0: Kusalaṁ sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.14:3.1_0: Abyākataṁ aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naabyākato naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
